actions.in_committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Executive Comment Requested from State, Treasury, Commerce, Labor, ITC, and USTR.

official_title: To suspend temporarily the duty on parts of speed changers for hydromechanical transmissions for use on aircraft.

summary.text: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend, through December 31, 1992, the duty on parts of speed changers for hydromechanical transmissions for use on aircraft.

titles.title: To suspend temporarily the duty on parts of speed changers for hydromechanical transmissions for use on aircraft.
